title: Grand Chef 59cm Ceramic Hob (Black)
description:
• Black ceramic glass one-piece frameless cooktop, with a slight front bevel
  • 4 QuickHeat ceramic cooking zones - 2x standard heating elements (16.5cm), 1x large heating element (20cm) & 1 triple heating element (12, 17.5 or 23cm)
  • Integrated sensor control with operating mode display
  • Electronic precise simmer control - to prevent your pans from boiling over
  • LED heat indicators
  • Easy to clean
  • Product Dimensions (cm) = H5.2 x W59 x D52

The Grand Chef KCT 6703 F ceramic hob. A standard-sized electric-powered cooktop for a British kitchen.

Ceramic hobs are an excellent choice for those who are short on time for cooking meals & want modern, maximum-performance capabilities.

The QuickHeat system ensures your cooktop reaches maximum temperature without delay, allowing you to save precious time during the cooking process - this makes this type of hob very popular for busy family life.

With 4 cooking zones, including 2x standard heating elements, 1x large heating element & 1x triple heating element, providing an adaptable & functional cooking surface.

LED heat indicators provide a visual warning to alert of heat from the cooktop & the appliance is operated by an integrated sensor control, conveniently located at the front of the cooktop.

Our favourite feature is the electronic precise simmer control - this function will prevent pans from boiling over and spilling onto the cooktop, helping you keep your cooking surface clean and much easier to maintain.

Full Description

Ceramic hobs

Hi-light heating elements provide a really quick start & powerful heat. The ultimate temperature is achieved quickly which results in saved time and energy. This capacity makes the hobs, which are produced of high-quality ceramic glass, similar to gas cookers. The hobs feature an elegant design which adds a sophisticated style to the kitchen. Ceramic hobs are easy-to-operate and easy-to- clean. The heating elements are controlled by means of non-stage controls.

Residual heat indicator

All the electric hobs by Kaiser are equipped with residual heat indicators ensuring users safety. The LED is lit until the temperatue of the corresponding heating zone drops below 60°C. Switched off heating zones can be used for warming up dishes which ensures energy saving.

Electronic precise simmer control

The system provides automatic lowering of the temperature according to your selection. First, the cooking zone is heated-up and then switches off automatically to preserve the temperature at your preselected level.

Ceramic hob without edged sides

This hob features a flat one-piece ceramic surface that is sleek, with slightly bevelled edges. The hob design not only impresses aesthetically but also ensures easy and convenient cleaning.

title: Empire 90cm Cooker Hood (Ivory)
description:
• Traditional style, large chimney cooker hood, in our beautiful gloss ivory enamel finish
  • Richly polished brass handle and trim to suit stylish kitchens
  • Air extractor mode; for external fume extraction
  • Odour absorber mode; for internal filtering & purification where external extraction is not possible
  • High performance - 910 m³/h max extraction in air extractor mode (820 m³/h in odour absorber mode)
  • 2x LED lamps (operated separately to extraction)
  • 3-speed control (low, medium, high)
  • Simple 5-button control panel (lighting on/off switch, low/medium/high-speed controls, power off)
  • Dimensions (cm) H x 86.5, W x 90, D x 48

The Empire A 9315 ElfEm Eco is a 90cm width, traditional & beautiful ivory colour variation of our popular wall-mounted cooker hood. The large 90cm width makes this the perfect choice for placement above your range cooker, or large family cooktop.

This hood has a glossy ivory finish, with metallic & bronze detailing. It's these details that make you fall in love with this product. With the striking Kaiser brand plate on the chimney, the easy-to-use 5-button control panel, and our favourite feature - the handle. This handle is perfect for quickly hooking a utensil, oven mitts, or even a towel as you're busy cooking in your kitchen.

As with all Kaiser cooker hoods, there's a choice of two operating modes to suit your kitchen layout & installation. Either use the recommended air extractor mode, for maximum performance capability. Or set up in odour absorber mode (also known as recirculation mode), if your kitchen does not allow for external extraction.

This cooker hood has a standard 3-speed control - low, medium and high. And, has 2x LED lamps to sufficiently light your cooktop.

Full Description

Exhaust air extractor mode

The metal grease filter purifies cooking vapours and smells by absorbing the fatty constituents and other tiny particles in the kitchen fumes. The air exhaust pipes can be either connected to the exhaust air conduction or directed to the outside.

Odour absorber mode

It is not always possible to connect the fume extractor hood to the ventilation system. In this case, the extractor hoods by Kaiser can operate as a filtering system. The metal grease filter absorbs the fatty constituents and other tiny particles from the cooking vapours first, then the odorous substances and micro particles are directed through the activated charcoal filter. The cooking vapours and fumes return, purified, into the kitchen.

Aluminium corrugated pipe

Used in exhaust mode; a 150mm diameter aluminium pipe which is easy to use and to assemble. This pipe can be bent as needed and stretched along the required length. As a lightweight product this does not require additional fixing to secure. There is also an included adaptor to connect pipes with a 120mm conduit.

Metal grease filter

This long-life filter is made of stainless materials (stainless steel and aluminium). Grease filters should be cleaned every two months during normal operation of the hood in a dishwasher or manually, using mild detergent or liquid soap.

Charcoal filter

Our charcoal filters use chemically treated activated carbon, and have a high absorption capacity. The filer is capable of retaining particles of contaminating substances, the weight of which exceeds five times its own weight. The carbon filter removes various smells, smoke and steam impurities during cooking. The charcoal filters installed in our cooker hoods are for odour absorption/recirculation mode.

Specification

Finishing:

Ivory finish with metal elements (logo plate, control panel). Bronze handle.

Telescopic duct (cm):

60–100

title: Avantgarde Pro 86cm Gas Hob (Black)
description:
• Large black gas on glass cooktop, with a front bevel
  • Preset for mains gas. Nozzles for 30 mbar and 50 mbar are included for LPG/propane
  • 5 gas burners - 1x triple Turbo burner, 1x large burner, 2x standard burners, 1x economy burner
  • Cast iron wok adapter included with your purchase
  • Front-mounted sturdy control knobs
  • One-handed ignition - no need for extra buttons or manual lighting
  • Removable cast iron supports that can be cleaned in your dishwasher
  • Flame failure safety device - gas supply is cut-off if the flame is extinguished
  • Product dimensions (cm) = H x 5.5, W x 86, D x 52
  • Countertop cutout size required (cm) = W x 73, D x 49

The Kaiser Avantgarde Pro KCG 9387 Turbo. A large gas on glass cooktop, with a front bevel on the black glass surface to provide a smooth transition between the cooktop & your kitchen countertop.

This stylish, modern, hob features 5 gas burners; a triple Turbo burner, a large burner, 2 standard burners & a small economy burner. This gives a huge amount of cooking space for a variety of pots & pans. Allowing you to cook numerous foods at the same time for the most perfect results when cooking meals for your family & friends. A wok adapter is also included with your purchase. This is best utilised on the triple Turbo burner, but you can use it on any burner of your choice.

All Kaiser gas appliances are equipped with our automatic pilotless ignition. Simply turn the sturdy knobs to ignite any of the reliable burners. And, of course, our control knobs are front-mounted so you don't need to reach over any naked flames. Your safety is always of paramount importance. This is why we also have our flame failure safety device, which will cut off the gas supply automatically in the event the flame is unexpectedly extinguished.

Our gas appliances are suitable for mains gas and are preset for this. However, we also include the nozzles for 30 mbar and 50 mbar for either LPG or propane. This means an easier installation, without additional costs for extra parts.

Our favourite elements are the sturdy cast iron supports - these are removable and can be easily cleaned either by a wipe or by placing them inside your dishwasher. That's right, we make your life easier by having dishwasher-safe components for easy cleaning. We're sure you'll love this too!

Full Description

Gas Operation

The appliance has been factory-preset as default to natural gas and can be also operated with LPG/propane. The liquid gas nozzles for 30 mbar and 50 mbar are included.

One handed ignition

All gas and gas-electric cookers by Kaiser are equipped with automatic pilotless ignition. Just turn the knob and the reliable burner is ignited. There is no need for additional matches or lighters.

Flame failure safety device

Flame can potentially extinguish because of either draught or boiled-over food. Our thermo-sensor detector will cut off the gas supply automatically if this occurs. This quick stop function ensures your safety at home.

Cast iron supports

These provide an increased amount of support space. Ours are matt black, removable, durable and best of all can be cleaned in your dishwasher.

Wok adapter

Made of cast iron and can be used on any of the burners.

Specification

Cooktop

Finishing:

black glass with front bevel, cast iron supports

Dimensions:

86 × 52 × 5.5

Niche dimensions:

width (cm): 73
depth (cm): 49

5 gas burners, namely:

title: Art Deco Electric Oven & Built-in Microwave Bundle (Ivory)
description:
This is our Art Deco oven & microwave bundle in traditional ivory. The perfect combination for built-in cooking appliances for your kitchen. In keeping with the predominant decorative art style of the 1920s and 1930s, our Art Deco collection is characterised by strong colours and bold delineated geometric shapes.

A timeless collection of beautiful appliances to enhance your home. Love cooking in your kitchen with Kaiser.

  • Oven dimensions = H x 59.5cm, W x 59.5cm, D x 56.8cm
  • Microwave dimensions; H x 39cm, W x 59.5cm, D x 34.5cm

EH 6726 ElfAD - Art Deco Electric Oven product details

EM 2545 ElfAD - Art Deco Microwave product details

Oven

  • Multi-functional electric oven, with 10 cooking modes
  • Large 70L capacity
  • Double infrared grill
  • Hot air system (fan-assisted cooking technology)
  • Easy clean enamel interior
  • Electronic timer (set total cooking time/on-off time etc)
  • Energy efficiency class A+
  • Product Dimensions = H x 59.5cm, W x 59.5cm, D x 56.8cm

A stunningly beautiful, single electric oven that will elevate the look of any kitchen.

This is our traditional ivory colour variation of this gorgeous oven and features a leather-coated handle with antique gold trims. With ivory glass and antique gold metal surround on this statement appliance.

Our favourite feature is the thermo-reflective glass used on the oven door. There are 2 glass panels on this oven, and therefore there is a cold front feel to the oven even when the appliance is turned on, and your food is cooking inside. This makes this an exceptionally safe appliance for a family home (there's also a child lock too).

With an easy clean enamel and 10 different cooking modes, this isn't a style-over-substance choice for your home. You really get the best of both worlds, with modern technology blended perfectly with the most elegant design.

Microwave

  • Ivory PMMA glass
  • Multi-functional built-in microwave oven, with 21 operating modes
  • Electronic timer & button controls
  • Grill function (1,300 W power)
  • Hot air function (2,300 W power)
  • Microwave function (900 W power)
  • Defrost by food weight
  • Automatic cooking programs
  • Build your own programs (up to 4 can be personalised just for you)
  • Dimensions (cm): H x 39, W x 59.5, D x 34.5

The Art Deco EM 2545 ElfAD built-in microwave in our traditional ivory PMMA glass. This fantastic microwave oven is designed to be built into your kitchen to build a range of cooking options for modern living.

Much more than a standard microwave, this Art Deco microwave features both grill and fan-assisted cooking options to allow you to cook in a variety of different ways from this single appliance. In fact, this luxurious, high-end microwave, has a total of 21 different operating modes - even allowing you to program 4 of your own favourites to personalise your appliance.

The Kaiser Empire EH 6355 ElfEm is a standard-sized, built-in, single-electric oven. This is a stunningly beautiful oven. With an enamelled ivory finish that gives a vintage look and style to make it a perfect option for your traditional style of kitchen.

Designed to make your life & cooking easy, with 8 easy-to-use operating features. These include a double infrared grill, top and bottom heat, and fan-assisted cooking. However, one thing that sets this oven apart, is the fantastic electric rotating rotisserie. This is included with your purchase and allows you to cook a piece of meat evenly, as it turns in the cavity whilst cooking. This is also the perfect way to cook a whole chicken, for juicy meat and crispy skin!

This oven is especially easy to clean and maintain too with enamel panels that can be wiped clean and a self-clean function. This allows you to spend more time on the things that matter, rather than hours cleaning the inside of an oven.

The bronze metal control knobs are highly durable (definitely not cheap plastic!), as is the front handle. And the analogue timer keeps the traditional look consistent, whilst still having an audible electronic timer for you to set cooking times with ease. This is a fantastic, high-quality oven for those who want great quality food, from a modern appliance, without any sacrifice on maintaining the style & look of your beautiful kitchen.

title: Empire Dual Fuel Range Cooker & 90cm Hood Bundle (Black)
description:
This is our Empire dual fuel range cooker & 90cm chimney style cooker hood bundle in black. Our Empire collection is renowned for the classical, timeless style and core colours to make your perfect traditional kitchen.

These appliances blend modern cooking technologies with true style for the perfect balance in your home. Love your kitchen & enjoy cooking with the Kaiser Empire collection.

  • Range Cooker dimensions = H x 90-96cm, W x 90cm, D x 60cm
  • Hood dimensions; H x 86.5cm, W x 90cm, D x 48cm

HGE 93555 Em - Empire Dual Fuel Range Cooker product details

A 9315 Em Eco - Empire Cooker Hood product details

Range Cooker

Electric Oven:

  • Electronic-analogue timer
  • Hot air system (fan assisted)
  • Double infrared grill
  • Rotating rotisserie - perfect for rotisserie chicken!
  • Self-clean function
  • Removable and machine-washable support rails
  • XXL oven – 115-litre capacity
  • Dimensions (H × W × D): 90-96cm × 90cm × 60cm (vertically adjustable feet to alter height)

Gas Hob:

  • High-grade steel
  • 5 gas burners - 1x triple Turbo burner, 1x large burner, 2x standard burners, 1x economy burner
  • Cast iron wok adapter
  • Front control knobs
  • One-handed ignition - no need for extra buttons or manual lighting
  • Removable cast iron supports that can be cleaned in your dishwasher
  • Flame failure safety device - gas supply is cut-off if the flame is extinguished

The Kaiser Empire HGE 93555 Em is a perfect choice for a family-sized dual-fuel range cooker. If you've got the luxury of a larger kitchen, then it's likely that the range cooker will be a centre-piece and a statement item within your home. You want something that is aesthetically magnificent, but also can perform to the highest standards - this is where Kaiser truly specialises.

This dual-fuel range cooker has an electric-powered oven & gas-powered cooktop and sits within our Empire product range. Our Empire range is renowned for being equally strong in style as well as performance. With a choice of core colours, this is our most popular black colour variation of this induction range cooker. The black colour is perfectly blended with the antique brass trim details for complete elegance. Equally perfect for both traditional and more contemporary kitchen styles.

Starting with the cooktop - you have a choice of 5 cooking zones of various sizes, so plenty of usable space for pots & pans to boil or fry. These cooking zones include a triple Turbo burner, a large burner, 2 standard-sized burners & an economy burner for a smaller pan. All of these are operated by the sturdy front-mounted control knobs, and are all one-handed ignition, so really easy to switch on and adjust the power level. We also include a cast iron wok adapter with your purchase, which is best used on the triple Turbo burner but can be used on any available space. We also use solid cast iron supports throughout, which are easy to remove and can be cleaned with ease in your dishwasher. You'll absolutely adore the ease of everything when using this appliance!

The oven has an immense 115-litre capacity. This is a huge volume of space for cooking large meals - think how easy Sunday lunch or Christmas dinner can be with all this space available! Fan-assisted technology is used for an even distribution of heat throughout this cavity, and the temperature is easy to control with our sturdy front-mounted control knobs. We include a rotating rotisserie with your purchase too. This is absolutely ideal for rotisserie chicken, but can also be used for chunks of meat, or other foods, for fabulous juicy meals! You can use the timer to alert you when your cooking time is complete. This is situated next to the digital clock.

Finally, we have the dish drawer at the bottom of the appliance. This can be used for storing cooking pots or pans and has roller guides to make it easy to access the contents.

This dual-fuel range cooker really does have everything you need for a premium quality, functional & beautiful appliance that will bring delight to your time in the kitchen.

Hood

  • Traditional style chimney cooker hood, in our anthracite black colour
  • Air extractor mode; for external fume extraction
  • Odour absorber mode; for internal filtering & purification where external extraction is not possible
  • High performance - 910 m³/h max extraction in air extractor mode (820 m³/h in odour absorber mode)
  • 2x LED lamps (operated separately to extraction)
  • 3-speed control (low, medium, high)
  • Simple 5-button control panel (lighting on/off switch, low/medium/high-speed controls, power off)
  • Dimensions (cm) H x 86.5, W x 60, D x 48

The Empire A 6315 Em Eco is a 60cm width, black colour variation, of our traditional & popular wall-mounted cooker hood.

This hood has a matt black finish, with metallic & bronze detailing. It's these details that make you fall in love with this product. With the striking Kaiser brand plate on the chimney, the easy-to-use 5-button control panel, and our favourite feature - the handle. This handle is perfect for quickly hooking a utensil, oven mitts, or even a towel as you're busy cooking in your kitchen.

As with all Kaiser cooker hoods, there's a choice of two operating modes to suit your kitchen layout & installation. Either use the recommended air extractor mode, for maximum performance capability. Or set up in odour absorber mode (also known as recirculation mode), if your kitchen does not allow for external extraction.

This cooker hood has a standard 3-speed control - low, medium and high. And, has 2x LED lamps to sufficiently light your cooktop.
